Package com.cosmicraiders

Class CosmicRaiders

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.Game
com.cosmicraiders.CosmicRaiders
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
public class CosmicRaiders extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
This instance of Game is the "root" of the libGDX class hierarchy. It is created by the Launcher. It creates instances of MainMenuScreen and GameScreen, a SpriteBatch for textures, etc.
